meanings.definition: A type of sailing boat used on the Nile River.
meanings.sent1: The dahabiahs gracefully glided along the calm waters of the Nile.
meanings.sent2: Tourists enjoyed a leisurely cruise on the dahabiahs during their vacation.
meanings.sent3: The dahabiahs decided to have a race to see who could reach the pyramid first.
meanings.sent4: The dahabiahs were like elegant swans floating on the river.
meanings.sent5: The colorful dahabiahs painted a beautiful picture against the backdrop of the ancient temples.

meanings.sent1: The group of dahabiahs gathered at the dock looked impressive.
meanings.sent2: Visitors were amazed by the variety of dahabiahs moored by the shore.
meanings.sent3: The dahabiahs threw a party to celebrate their successful journey down the river.
meanings.sent4: The dahabiahs stood out like jewels in the crown of the Nile.
meanings.sent5: The fleet of dahabiahs created a vibrant scene against the ancient ruins.
